00021 class Socket;

00026 /* This is derived from SocketData only to pass this object using SocketControlMsg */
00027 class SerialSocketData  : public SocketData
00028 {
00029     typedef SocketData Base;
00030 
00031     friend class SerialSocket;
00032     friend class SerialClientSocket;
00033     friend class SerialServerSocket;
00034     friend class SerialSocketSubSystem;
00035 
00036     public:
00037         SerialSocket* GetAttachedSerialSocket() const { return ( m_socket ); }
00038         ExecutionContext* GetContext() const { return m_context; }
00039 
00040         BOOLEAN IsInUse() const { return m_socket != 0; }
00041 
00042         SerialIoSet *GetSerialIoSet () const { return m_io_set; }
00043         void SetSerialIoSet ( SerialIoSet *set ) { m_io_set = set; }
00044 
00045     private:
00046         SerialSocket *m_socket;
00047         ExecutionContext *m_context;
00048         SerialIoSet *m_io_set;
00049 
00050         SerialSocketData();
00051 
00052         void Attach(SerialSocket *s);
00053         void Detach(SerialSocket *s);
00054 };
